name: Steam Eruption
effect:
This Move counts as either Fire or Water type, depending on what is more beneficial to the User. 
 At Silver Rank, increase this move's power to 4.
 At Gold Rank, this Move inflicts Burn.
 At Platinum Rank, increase this move's power to 6.
 At Diamond Rank, this Move reduces Special or Dexterity, depending on if it counted as a Fire or Water move respectively.
description: In less than a second, the sound of steam boiling over a raging engine thunders through the ears of the foe before it is shot through the sky by a scalding geyser.
